title: Bobby Gets Thrown Under The Bus on Dating Life + Amy makes Cash offer for Someone to be ‘Alexa” at Son’s Birthday Party + Bobby on returning to American Idol
itunes:title: Bobby Gets Thrown Under The Bus on Dating Life + Amy makes Cash offer for Someone to be ‘Alexa” at Son’s Birthday Party + Bobby on returning to American Idol
description:
Amy’s son wants Amazon Alexa to come to his birthday party this weekend so she puts a cash offer for anyone who can play the part. Bobby gets thrown under the bus by Amy on his dating life and he gets to talk about returning to American Idol as a mentor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
